code: import React,{Component}from"react";import{injectIntl}from"react-intl";import TagsInput from"react-tagsinput";import"react-tagsinput/react-tagsinput.css";class TagsInputExample extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.handleTagChange=tags=>{this.setState({tags});};this.state={tags:[]};}render(){const messages=this.props.intl.messages;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TagsInput,{value:this.state.tags,onChange:this.handleTagChange,inputProps:{placeholder:messages["pages.tags"]}});}}export default injectIntl(TagsInputExample);
